overview: Tim Stern, President and Co-Founder of Lenders One, had ten years of experience in the real estate industry before joining Lenders One. That experience gave Stern a firsthand appreciation of the value of an organization that coordinates and optimizes the strengths of independent mortgage bankers. Stern’s responsibilities include identifying highly qualified Member candidates, managing the team of Regional Managers, facilitating networking and learning opportunities as well as seeking new Member Benefit channels, including the development the Community Mortgage Lenders of America to give Lenders One Members, and other independent mortgage bankers, a voice at the national legislative table.
